trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Saginaw
There were no other sightings in Saginaw on or around November 1st 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home last night from my friends house in millington so i took m15 home because i live in saginaw so was passing almost to saginaw just before the airport and and i saw an object in air with a red and green light. I thought nothing of it thinking it was a plane it then suddenly changed paths dropping into a u pattern then just shot off and dissapeared. I just was astonished my mouth dropped i still cant believe what i saw! i just wish i could have got a picture but it happened so fast!
Summary: I saw flying sacuer like thing that was going in a path thought it was a plane then just with ridiclious speed changed directions.
